column2: BRIEF-Buckle Says Quarterly Sales Fell 3.5 Pct To $204.9 Mln May 10 (Reuters) - Buckle Inc: * BUCKLE - COMPARABLE STORE NET SALES YEAR-TO-DATE FOR 13-WEEK PERIOD ENDED MAY 5, 2018 DECREASED 3.1 PERCENT * Q1 REVENUE VIEW $207.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Buckle Up, Prime Members Amazon Launches In-Car Delivery April 24 (Reuters) - Amazon.com Inc: * AMAZON.COM - IN-CAR DELIVERY AVAILABLE TO CUSTOMERS WITH COMPATIBLE 2015 OR NEWER CHEVROLET, BUICK, GMC OR CADILLAC VEHICLE WITH ACTIVE ONSTAR ACCOUNT * AMAZON.COM INC - IN-CAR DELIVERY ALSO AVAILABLE TO CUSTOMERS WITH 2015 OR NEWER VOLVO VEHICLE WITH ACTIVE VOLVO ON CALL ACCOUNT * AMAZON.COM - AMAZON KEY SERVICE NOW GIVES CUSTOMERS OPTION TO RECEIVE DELIVERIES INSIDE THEIR VEHICLE * AMAZON.COM - IN-CAR DELIVERY AVAILABLE AT NO EXTRA COST FOR PRIME MEMBERS AND IS AVAILABLE FROM APRIL 24 IN 37 CITIES ACROSS U.S. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)

BRIEF-Buckle Inc CEO Dennis Nelson's FY 2017 Total Compensation Was $3 Mln April 20 (Reuters) - Buckle Inc: * BUCKLE INC PRESIDENT AND CEO DENNIS NELSON'S FY 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $3 MILLION VERSUS $3.3 MILLION IN FY 2016 - SEC FILING Source text: (bit.ly/2vBHW8i) Further company coverage:
